name: Automatiser le support client avec Gmail, Google Sheets, les donn√©es ERP et l'IA GPT-4o
description:
# üåê Assistant de support client IA - Version Cloud

**Ce que fait ce flux de travail :**

Cette automatisation de support client aliment√©e par l'IA traite les demandes de support entrantes par e-mail ou chat, les analyse √† l'aide de l'IA, r√©cup√®re le contexte pertinent et g√©n√®re des r√©ponses pr√©liminaires pour les agents de support.

**Fonctionnalit√©s cl√©s :**

‚úÖ Entr√©e multi-canal : D√©clencheurs par e-mail et chat
‚úÖ Analyse aliment√©e par l'IA : Extrait le sentiment, l'urgence et les informations cl√©s
‚úÖ Int√©gration de contexte : Combine les manuels produits, les donn√©es ERP et l'historique de support
‚úÖ G√©n√©ration de r√©ponses pr√©liminaires : Cr√©e des r√©ponses professionnelles en allemand
‚úÖ Humain dans la boucle : Flux de travail d'approbation avant l'envoi aux clients

**Instructions de d√©monstration :**
1. Utilisez l'interface de chat pour tester avec des requ√™tes clients d'exemple
2. Ou envoyez des e-mails de test pour d√©clencher le flux de travail par e-mail
3. Regardez comment l'IA analyse et g√©n√®re des r√©ponses contextuelles

workflow.name: [MW] AI Customer Support Assistant - Cloud Version

parameters.content:
# üåê AI Customer Support Assistant - Cloud Version

## What this workflow does:
This AI-powered customer support automation processes incoming support requests via email or chat, analyzes them using AI, retrieves relevant context, and generates draft responses for support agents.

## Key Features:
‚úÖ **Multi-channel Input**: Email & chat triggers
‚úÖ **AI-powered Analysis**: Extracts sentiment, urgency, and key information
‚úÖ **Context Integration**: Combines product manuals, ERP data, and support history
‚úÖ **Draft Response Generation**: Creates professional responses in German
‚úÖ **Human-in-the-loop**: Approval workflow before sending to customers

## Demo Instructions:
1. Use the Chat interface to test with sample customer queries
2. Or send test emails to trigger the email workflow
3. Watch how AI analyzes and generates contextual responses

**üåê This is the CLOUD version using OpenAI and Google services**

## üìß Email Trigger

**Purpose**: Monitors Gmail for incoming customer support requests

**How it works**:
‚Ä¢ Polls Gmail every minute for new emails
‚Ä¢ Filters can be configured for specific labels/criteria
‚Ä¢ Extracts email content, sender info, and metadata

**Demo tip**: Send a test email to see this in action!

## üí¨ Chat Trigger

**Purpose**: Provides a real-time chat interface for testing

**How it works**:
‚Ä¢ Creates a webhook URL for chat interactions
‚Ä¢ Ideal for demos and testing scenarios
‚Ä¢ Processes messages instantly

**Demo tip**: Perfect for live demonstrations!

## üß† AI Information Extractor

**Purpose**: Analyzes customer messages with AI to extract structured data

**Extracts**:
‚Ä¢ Category (technical, billing, sales, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Urgency level (low, medium, high, critical)
‚Ä¢ Customer sentiment
‚Ä¢ Keywords for context search
‚Ä¢ Product identifiers
‚Ä¢ Required action type

**AI Model**: OpenAI GPT-4o-mini

## üìä Historical Support Data

**Purpose**: Retrieves previous support cases for context

**Data Source**: Google Sheets with historical customer interactions

**Contains**:
‚Ä¢ Previous questions & answers
‚Ä¢ Common issues & solutions
‚Ä¢ Response templates
‚Ä¢ Product-specific guidance

**Why important**: Ensures consistent, high-quality responses

## üìö Product Knowledge Base

**Purpose**: Accesses comprehensive product documentation

**Data Source**: Google Drive (Primotech Manual PDF)

**Contains**:
‚Ä¢ Technical specifications
‚Ä¢ Operating instructions
‚Ä¢ Troubleshooting guides
‚Ä¢ Safety information

**Processing**: PDF text extraction for AI analysis

**Cloud advantage**: Always up-to-date documentation

## üè¢ ERP System Integration

**Purpose**: Retrieves customer & inventory data

**Data Source**: Mock ERP API (demo purposes)

**Provides**:
‚Ä¢ Customer account information
‚Ä¢ Order history
‚Ä¢ Product availability
‚Ä¢ Spare part pricing

**Note**: In production, this would connect to your real ERP system

**Cloud benefit**: Real-time data access

## ü§ñ Response Generation

**Purpose**: Creates professional customer responses using AI

**AI Model**: OpenAI GPT-4o-mini

**Input Context**:
‚Ä¢ Customer's original message
‚Ä¢ Extracted information (sentiment, urgency, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Product manual content
‚Ä¢ Historical support cases
‚Ä¢ ERP data (pricing, availability)

**Output**: Professional German response following company standards

## üë• Human-in-the-Loop Approval

**Purpose**: Ensures quality control before sending responses

**Process**:
1. AI-generated response is sent to support agent
2. Agent reviews and can approve/reject/modify
3. Only approved responses are sent to customers

**Benefits**:
‚Ä¢ Quality assurance
‚Ä¢ Learning from modifications
‚Ä¢ Regulatory compliance

**Note**: Critical for maintaining customer trust

parameters.subject: Customer Support Response - Approval Required

parameters.content:
## How to run a demo
- add google / openai credentials
- change email of approver to something you can access

user.name: AOE Agent Lab
user.bio:
We are AOE‚Äôs AI & Automation Team ‚Äì engineers, architects, and AI specialists.
We build production-ready, agent-based automation using n8n, LLMs, vector stores, and secure toolchains.
Our focus: ideation, evaluation-driven development, and scalable AI architecture.
All workflows are modular, reusable, and built for real-world application ‚Äì by practitioners

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
